divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing with my cousin and i looked in the sky and saw It was flying over top at night it didnt make a noise and it was really high in the sky and was solid i could not see stars in back of it there is an airport but this ufo had no lights and was going the opposite direction.it was flying at slow speed then took off in high velocity
Summary: It was flying over top at night it didnt make a noise and it was really high in the sky and was solid i could not see stars in back of it
